ProductInfo.Features:
Inspired by nature, the Triton sees, listens, and responds to your requirements.
A front-facing camera on this phone works with the Smart Stay feature to adjust brightness to give you continued viewing leisure
Enjoy multitasking with the Pop up Play feature of this smartphone that lets you chat with friends, watch HD videos, and surf the web simultaneously
Running on the Android 4.1 OS, this marble white Triton cell phone enables you to enjoy all applications on its wide 4.6-inch touchscreen
ProductInfo.Name: Triton Unlocked Phones - Android 4.1 Dual Core CPU Smartphone with 4.6 Inch Capacitive Touchscreen (Dual Sim, Gps, 3g,wifi)
